citing_paper_authors: Kristen, Parton | Kathleen R., McKeown | Bob, Coyne | Mona, Diab | Ralph, Grishman | Dilek, Hakkani-Tür | Mary P., Harper | Heng, Ji | Wei-Yun, Ma | Adam, Meyers | Sara, Stolbach | Ang, Sun | Gokhan, Tur | Wei, Xu | Sibel, Yaman
raw_text: For this work, we have re-implemented and enhanced the Berkeley parser (Petrov and Klein 2007) in several ways: (1) developed a new method to handle rare words in English and Chinese; (2) developed a new model of unknown Chinese words based on characters in the word; (3) increased robustness by adding adaptive modification of pruning thresholds and smoothing of word emission probabilities
clean_text: For this work, we have re-implemented and enhanced the Berkeley parser (Petrov and Klein 2007) in several ways: (1) developed a new method to handle rare words in English and Chinese; (2) developed a new model of unknown Chinese words based on characters in the word; (3) increased robustness by adding adaptive modification of pruning thresholds and smoothing of word emission probabilities.
